(Mr. RICKETTS assumed the Chair.)

…Bennet, Booker, Duckworth, Durbin,  Hirono, Kaine, King, Heinrich, Hickenlooper, Kim, Klobuchar, Markey,  Merkley, Murphy, Murray, Sanders, Schatz, Shaheen, Slotkin, Smith, Van  Hollen, Warner, Warnock, Warren, and Wyden.

Mr. President, I want to conclude my remarks tonight by sharing one  more time the name of this infant girl, and I ask my colleagues…
